actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide for recovery of costs associated with the postage, printing and handling of market information and statistics pursuant to the Cotton Statistics and Estimates Act and the Tobacco Inspection Act.

summary.text: Amends the Cotton Statistics and Estimates Act and the Tobacco Inspection Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to charge fees to cover market information printing and mailing costs.

titles.title: A bill to provide for recovery of costs associated with the postage, printing and handling of market information and statistics pursuant to the Cotton Statistics and Estimates Act and the Tobacco Inspection Act.
